price: A chacun une orientation vers laquelle il se tourne. Rivalisez donc dans les bonnes œuvres. Où que vous soyez, Allah vous ramènera tous vers Lui, car Allah est, certes Omnipotent.
arabic: وَلِكُلّٖ وِجۡهَةٌ هُوَ مُوَلِّيهَاۖ فَٱسۡتَبِقُواْ ٱلۡخَيۡرَٰتِۚ أَيۡنَ مَا تَكُونُواْ يَأۡتِ بِكُمُ ٱللَّهُ جَمِيعًاۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٞ

version.title: French Translation - Muhammad Hamidullah
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Muhammad Hamidullah. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walikullin wij'hatun huwa muwallīhā fa-is'tabiqū al-khayrāti ayna mā takūnū yati bikumu al-lahu jamīʿan inna al-laha ʿalā kulli shayin qadīrun
